Text.text: This panel uses margin classes 'sapUiLargeMarginBegin' and 'sapUiLargeMarginBottom' to clear a 48px (3rem) space to the left and bottom.
Since panels have a default width of 100%, horizontal margins are not displayed appropriately. Therefore we need to set the panel's 'width' property to 'auto'.
To see what happens in Right-To-Left mode open 'Settings' by pressing the cog wheel button next to 'Entities'.
